item.title: Need a NFL / NBA YouTube Video Editor 🏈🏀🎬 - Upwork
item.description:
Need a fast video editor who can work with me consistently (daily) on video editing NFL / NBA sports content for YouTube.

Knowledge in CapCut and Fantasy Football is a BIG BONUS for landing this job 🙏

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1c8glfRYhu54zcPv22ltPuf3-Dv8Y5zJK/view?usp=drivesdk

^ the videos need to look like exactly like this editing and style wise.

Very simple editing

Takes me an hour to do.

I can provide the video (raw / untrimmed)

A editing tutorial on how I edit them( I use capcut to edit these)

Stats / graphics / assets

Background

And whatever else you need to get these done fast and efficient.

Pretty simple straight forward work.

If you do well with me on these,

Willing and ready to hire someone full time to join my video editing team.

Paying a flat rate per video $

Looking forward to seeing your submissions!

(So I know you didn’t just copy and paste or use A.I. to submit your proposal, start your submission off with the words “BUTTERED TOAST!”)

Take Care & God Bless. - Geo

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

Category: Video Editing

item.title: Skilled Video Editor or Content Creator - Transforming Limited Resources into Captivating Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and highly creative Video Content Creator to join our team on Upwork. As a skilled professional, you will have the unique ability to produce engaging videos from scratch, using limited available content and transforming our existing pool into a larger, more diverse library. Your exceptional creativity and proficiency in video creation will be instrumental in delivering high-quality videos that captivate and engage our audiences across various platforms.

Responsibilities:
- Generate innovative ideas, develop concepts, and create compelling scripts for video content.
- Film and edit videos with precision, incorporating visual effects, audio enhancements, and other enhancements.
- Collaborate closely with clients to understand their objectives, brand guidelines, and target audience.
- Produce high-quality video content across multiple platforms, including YouTube, Instagram, and Facebook.
- Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery while maintaining exceptional attention to detail.

Requirements:
- Please attach a link to your portfolio showcasing your previous work.
- Strong understanding of visual storytelling, audio production, and video effects.
- Ability to work with limited resources and creatively expand existing content.
- This contract will be hourly using the Upwork timer.


Posted On: June 22, 2024 20:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Wondershare Filmora, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Graphic Design
Skills: Wondershare Filmora, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Graphic Design
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Content creator - Upwork
item.description:
Job Post: Content Creator/Creative Designer
Are you a creative visionary with a knack for producing captivating short-form videos? We're on the hunt for a talented Content Creator/Creative Designer to join our team. Your primary task will be to create engaging TikTok-style reels that are between 35-50 seconds long. This role demands someone with a keen eye for different video angles and hooks, especially skilled at grabbing viewers' attention in the critical first 3 seconds.
Key Responsibilities:
Video Production: Create high-quality, engaging TikTok-style videos.
Tool Proficiency: Utilize CapCut and Adobe Premiere proficiently to edit and enhance video content.
Captioning: Generate auto captions in multiple languages, ensuring accessibility and broader audience reach.
Script Writing: Develop compelling and winning scripts that can drive viewer engagement.
Content Strategy: Implement different angles and hooks to maximize the effectiveness of each video.
Efficiency: Maintain a high level of productivity by creating 9-12 videos daily.
Qualifications:
Experience: Proven track record of creating content for dropshipping businesses or brands.
Technical Skills: Proficient in CapCut and Adobe Premiere for video editing.
Multilingual Capabilities: Experience in generating auto captions and managing content in multiple languages.
Creative Excellence: Ability to develop winning scripts and short cuts that captivate audiences.
Attention to Detail: Keen eye for different video angles and hooks, particularly in the first 3 seconds of the video.
Job Details:
Position Type: Full-time
Compensation: $3 per video
Daily Output: Produce 9-12 videos every day
Application Process:
To apply, please submit the following:
Resume: Highlighting your relevant experience.
Portfolio/Proof of Work: Evidence of your previous work.
Introduction: Start your application with the word "Strawberry" to ensure you have read the full job post before introducing yourself.
Additionally, please answer the following questions to help us get to know you better and assess your suitability for the role:
Interest: Why are you interested in this position?
Fit: Why should we hire you?
Work Environment: What is your ideal work environment?
Strengths: What are your strengths?
We are excited to see your creativity in action and look forward to your application!


Posted On: June 22, 2024 19:42 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:CapCut, Graphic Design, Content Creation, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, TikTok Ad
Skills: CapCut, Graphic Design, Content Creation, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, TikTok Ad
Country: BEL
click to apply

item.title: Need a Video Editor to Edit Stock Videos in an Instagram Reel - Upwork
item.description:
Heyyyy Talent Video Editor Friends!!

I'm Tiffany, the founder of frances marie (IG: @byfrancesmarie) a direct-to-consumer luxury perfume brand that uses mood enhancing ingredients to inspire Black women to feel more confident in being exactly who they are.

I'm gearing up for a Feb or March launch of my first scent and I'm in need of a really impactful Instagram Reel created for Valentine's Day. I have the storyboard with the voice over attached to the job. I'm not married to how the current layout and welcome any suggestions. I'm a marketer by trade and have worked with a lot of video genius which I am not :) But I wanted to provide something so you'll at least have a sense of what I'm looking for.

I've also included 4 stock videos that I plan to use. I have 10 in total but attaching 4 as examples. Please review and let me know your thoughts about the quality. I can also provide timestamps/clip durations that I'd like for each frame.

Now the fun part...budget.

My budget is extremely tight, as I'm gearing up to launch. Who knew creating a perfume brand from scratch WITH custom, one of a kind scent would be so expensive. But anywho, because I am a marketer I am all about paying creatives what they're worth.

But take it easy on me *No Adele* because the budget is tight. And I'm willing to put in some work where I can. For example, selecting the part of each stock video files that I like and adding it to the storyboard. Just let me know.

I feel like I'm rambling. Looking forward to connecting!!


Posted On: June 22, 2024 19:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Video Editing
Skills: Instagram Reels, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
About the Company:
Rylet is pivoting towards digital media and e-commerce. We are dedicated to delivering high-quality content to our audience and seek a talented YouTube Video Editor to join our team.

If you have a passion for video editing and are skilled in creating engaging content, we want to hear from you!

Job Overview:
We seek a creative and experienced YouTube Video Editor to help produce high-quality videos for our YouTube channel.

We have an extensive roadmap for comprehensive content, including gaming videos, documentaries, film summaries, and more. In Q3, we want to begin by producing a gaming channel composed of 10- —to 11-minute videos and associated shorts.

Our minimum goal is to release at least two long-form (i.e., 10+ minute videos) twice per week. Hence, editors and other creatives have room to grow with the company. This can potentially turn into a full-time opportunity.

The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of YouTube video production, including optimal specifications for video uploads, and a keen eye for detail. This role requires someone who can transform raw footage into polished, engaging content that aligns with our brand and meets our audience's expectations.

Key Responsibilities:
- Must be familiar with YouTube's documentation found here: https://www.youtube.com/intl/en_us/creators/
- Edit and produce high-quality videos for our YouTube channel, ensuring they are engaging and aligned with our brand.
- Collaborate with the content team to develop video concepts and scripts.
- Ensure videos meet the optimal specifications for YouTube, including resolution, format, and file size.
- Apply motion graphics, special effects, and other visual elements to enhance videos.
- Conduct color correction and sound design to improve the overall quality of videos.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in video editing and YouTube content creation.
- Manage and organize video files and assets.
- Upload and optimize videos for YouTube, including adding tags, descriptions, and thumbnails.

Required Qualifications:
- MUST be able to proficiently read, write, and speak clear North American English.
- Proven experience as a video editor, preferably focusing on YouTube content.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- Strong understanding of YouTube’s technical requirements and best practices for video uploads.
- Excellent sense of pacing, timing, and storytelling.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Strong attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality work.
- Knowledge of motion graphics and special effects.
- Familiarity with YouTube analytics and SEO best practices.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with graphic design software such as Adobe Photoshop or Illustrator.
- Familiarity with other video editing and motion graphics software.
- Knowledge of social media platforms and their video requirements, including but not limited to Facebook, Instagram, and X (formerly known as Twitter).
- Creative problem-solving skills and ability to think outside the box.

Optimal Specifications for YouTube Videos:

Reference (https://www.youtube.com/intl/en_us/creators/how-things-work/getting-started/)
1. Resolution:
   - Standard HD: 1280x720 (720p)
   - Full HD: 1920x1080 (1080p)
   - 4K: 3840x2160 (2160p)
2. Format: MP4 is preferred with H.264 video codec and AAC-LC audio codec.
3. Aspect Ratio: 16:9 is standard for YouTube videos.
4. Frame Rate: 24, 25, 30, 48, 50, 60 frames per second are supported. Choose a frame rate that matches the original footage.
5. Bitrate:
   - For 1080p: 8 Mbps for Standard HD and 12 Mbps for Full HD.
   - For 4K: 35-45 Mbps.
6. Audio:
   - Stereo audio with a sample rate of 44.1 kHz or 48 kHz.
   - Bitrate of 384 kbps.
7. Duration: Aim for a video length that maintains audience engagement. Typically, 10-20 minutes is ideal for most content types, but it can vary based on the content.
8. File Size: Keep the file size below 128 GB for easier uploads and processing.
9. Thumbnails:
   - Resolution: 1280x720.
   - Format: JPG, PNG, BMP, or GIF.
   - Keep them under 2 MB.
10. Titles and Descriptions:
    - Use relevant keywords for SEO.
    - Keep titles under 60 characters to avoid truncation.
    - Descriptions can be up to 5000 characters, including relevant links and timestamps.

Quality of Work Expected:
- Consistency: Maintain a consistent style and quality across all videos to reinforce our brand identity.
- Engagement: Create content that captivates and retains the audience’s attention, encouraging likes, comments, and shares.
- Professionalism: Ensure all videos are polished, error-free, and meet high production standards.
- Creativity: Bring innovative ideas to the table and experiment with new techniques to keep the content fresh and exciting.
- Timeliness: Deliver projects within the agreed-upon deadlines. This is NON-NEGOTIABLE.
- Attention to Detail: Meticulously review all aspects of the video, including audio levels, visual elements, and overall flow.

Application Process:
To apply for this position, please be prepared to provide a minimum of ...

- A portfolio or examples of your previous video editing work, preferably including YouTube videos.
- Any additional information you think would help us understand your skills and passion for video editing.



Budget: $25
Posted On: June 22, 2024 19:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Digital Video, Footage-Based Video, Gaming Video, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing
Skills: Digital Video, Footage-Based Video, Gaming Video, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
